Description: A pair of bangles: now slightly mis-shapen, made from a flat strip of silver, slightly bevelled on the outside and flat on the inside.
Curator's comments: Also from this burial: pairs of bracelets (1904,1008.30 & 1904,1008.31), collar (1904,1008.28). Bibliography: E. Naville, 'The XIth Dynasty temple at Dier el-Bahari' I (London, 1907), 44; pl. X.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (383)
